reviewText: The video had three parts. Each episode showed what accommodations the traveler could expect and where the ship could travel to. Each episode showed all least some of the nude travelers and some of the activities they could do on ship or on shore at a port  The largest ship could have more than a thousand travelers on board in addition to the ships crew. The middle size held about four to five hundred travelers in addition to the ships crew. The small size ship was a schooner type ship and held about a hundred travelers in addition to the ships crew.
